metadata.name: FLUCTUATION OF THE CAUSAL BODY
metadata.description:
The shimmering dance plays madness and the threads of reincarnation entwine.

A causal gyration.
It is a genealogy of unbroken causality.

The vessel of the soul filled with ether emits a mysterious light to show the soul's journey.

I leave myself to the destiny spun forever in the universe where infinite time continues.
